command.electricblocks.block_broken: An electric block was broken. Requesting simulation update.
command.electricblocks.requestsimulation: EletricBlocks could not connect to simulation server! Please notify your server administrator.

Please notify your server administrator.
The electrical network appears to have a connection that doesn't go to anywhere. Some blocks like transformers require two or more connections.

Loop detected in wire. This loop will be ignored.
The load flow failed to converge on a solution. Network will be zero'd out.

command.electricblocks.viewmodify.err_in: The multimeter is unable to view or modify this block.
